body:
Sarith,



You can find an example file for a Honeybee Radiation study here:

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&amp...;](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Surface_by_surface_geometry_preparation_for_daylight_simulation_I&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0)

Your exception was because you have to set the study type to Radiation and not the default Illuminance.



-Chris
